name: Hitask - Team Task management
description: Quickly create tasks in your Hitask account directly from your browser toolbar.
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; font-src 'self' https://cdn.hitask.com; script-src 'self' https://www.google-analytics.com https://cdn.hitask.com; connect-src https://hitask.com https://cdn.hitask.com https://sentry.io https://api.mixpanel.com; style-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'self' blob:; media-src data:; img-src 'self' data: https://hitask.com http://www.google-analytics.com https://hitask.s3.amazonaws.com;
